Tool

NameGrid Statistics for Polygons
ID2
AuthorO.Conrad (c) 2003, Quantile Calculation (c) 2007 by Johan Van de Wauw
Specificationgrid

Description

Zonal grid statistics. For each polygon statistics based on all covered grid cells will be calculated.

Parameters

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Input
Grids Grid list (input)GRIDS
Polygons Shapes (input)POLYGONS
Output

Use Multiple CoresBooleanPARALLELIZEDDefault: 0
